games.name: Duck Life
games.description: Train up a duckling then enter it in races! As you play the training mini games, the duck levels up, making it faster during the races

games.name: Duck Life 2
games.description: Train up a duckling then enter it in races to become the world champion of duck racing! (yes duck racing exists)

games.name: Duck Life 3
games.description: Train up your duck and enter it in races! This time, Ducklife meets Pokemon as the ducks can evolve to become naturally better at certain skills.

games.name: Duck Life 4
games.description: Train your team of ducks to reach the top of the duck racing championship in this long-awaited sequel

games.name: Bloons TD 1
games.description: A tower defense game where monkeys and their towers try to stop enemy balloons (called Bloons) from getting through the track by popping them

games.name: Bloons TD 2
games.description: A tower defense game where monkeys and their towers try to stop enemy balloons (called Bloons) from getting through the track by popping them

games.description: A tower defense game where monkeys and their towers try to stop enemy balloons (called Bloons) from getting through the track by popping them

games.name: Bloons TD PP 3

games.name: Bloons TD PP 4

games.name: Fancy Pants Adventure
games.description: Think about Sonic the Hedgehog with a more clean design and some physics effects added. Ah, and a character that wears some really fancy pants! Just run through the levels, avoiding the monsters and collecting the swirls and trophies.

games.name: Toss The Turtle
games.description: Shoot as far as possible using cannons, guns, bombs, jetpacks, rockets, nukes, and a bunch of other cool gadgets

games.name: Cell Machine Mystic Mod Plus Milenakos Mod
